name: Dungeon Dash (Natick High School Games)
description:
Dungeon Dash is a 2D Top-Down Rogue-like created by a team of 4 in the Spring of 2018.  This team had an ambitious goal of figuring out how to create a rogue-like auto generating dungeon.  Having each team  member focused in a different area allowed them to have maximum focus on each aspect of the project.

Team:

Scott B - Programming

Dominic S - Programming

Antony  H - Art

Sebastian G - Art

How to Play:

WASD to Move

Mouse to Aim

Click to Use Weapon

Numbers (1, 2, 3, 4) to Select Inventory Item
